title: WTB: Reds and Phillies with Specific Backs
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: Reds and Phillies with Specific Backs
posts.post_content:
This November I am wanting to buy a selection of Reds and Phillies with specific backs, and right now I am trying to get a sense of what might be available so I can prioritize, as I will not have the funds to purchase everything I want! Below is what I am looking for - my budget will require lower grades, in the 1-2 range. If you have anything you'd be open to selling in November, please send me a DM. Thank you!

Chris

Reds
Harry Gasper: EPDG or Broad Leaf
Dick Hoblitzell: EPDG or Broad Leaf
Dode Paskert: Broad Leaf

Phillies
Kitty Bransfield: Hindu or SC 150/649 OP
Red Dooin: EPDG
Mickey Doolan (fielding): Cycle 350 or AB 350
Mickey Doolin: EPDG
Sherry Magee (with bat): Pied 42, Cycle 460, Sov 350
